name: InstaRamen
description:
Cup Noodle Simulator is a visual novel about creating your perfect instant ramen dinner; add interesting, strange, or delicious ingredients to your instant ramen and have them judged by the Cup Noodle Goddess, who will check in on your creation of the night. See how she comments on what you make and don't be afraid of making something she may dislike :)

IMPORTANT NOTE: Please let all scrolling text finish scrolling before proceeding to the next line. Pressing space before it is done may break the game a little bit LOL

IMPORTANT NOTE 2: Please play in full screen by clicking the blue icon in the lower right corner :)

Music and SFX by Kyle / Koshi
Koshi's Spotify
